instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2530: What is 820-2530? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.A1278: What is A1278? A1278 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook or Macbook Pro Unibody from years Late 2008, Mid 2009, Mid 2010, Early 2011, Late 2011, Mid 2012 with EMC 2254, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-2327, 820-2530, 820-2879, 820-2936, 820-3115..
definitions.I2C_ALS_SDA: What is I2C_ALS_SDA? I2C_ALS_SDA is a SMBUS data line between the ambient light sensor and the T2 chip..

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2530</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> TS0P unable read error
threads.message:
Hello everybody;

I m working on <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2009 year. Fan noise and CPU usage %100 . When do ASD it shows TS0P unable read error.

Tried;

replaced track pad and cable
replaced bluetooth and wifi cable with know good cable
replaced SMC

same status

where can i check next step?

thanks

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2530</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> TS0P unable read error
threads.message:
Unplug airport cable. There is nothing else on this bus besides trackpad/ALS. 
If it still not working measure both data lines on diode mode.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2530</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> TS0P unable read error
threads.message: Thank you Duke <SIGNAL>I2C_ALS_SDA</SIGNAL> line is shorted ground in J3401 replaced connector and solved problem.
